item.title: ProxySQL
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Supported ProxySQL Features Features Availability Load balance MySQL Group Replication ✓ Load balance PerconaXtraDB Cluster ✗ Custom Configuration ✓ Using Custom docker image ✓ Builtin Prometheus Discovery ✓ Using Prometheus operator ✓ User Guide Overview of ProxySQL here.
